events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and received the wrong size. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentions return and refund requests due to wrong size received.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong size jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received a jacket in the wrong size and would like a refund. I am here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging so we can start the refund process?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is still unused and is in the original packaging, just as I received it.
Thanks for the info. We will initiate the refund once you ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label that we will email to you shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick help. I'll wait for the return label email and send the jacket back today.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if you need any further assistance regarding your refund.
I mailed the jacket back yesterday, and I received confirmation of the refund in my account today. Thanks for your help!
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. Closing your case now. Feel free to contact us again for any future needs.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
